CONTENT WAS COMMENTED ON - LARGE COMMENT

Games of the 21st century PDF
Well, I'm just as opposed to all this "political correctness" as the next person these days, but I think ethnic groups would be closer to the mark. Just terminology, though. Can't win for losing and we can't get out of the game, as the saying goes. Historical black figures do deserve their props but i do not believe that setting aside a set amount of time to honor them is productive to end racism. It only draws a distinction between whites, blacks, and any other group of people. Yeah, I can see your point there, and it's a valid one. I personally don't have an opinion about setting aside an entire month specifically for blacks. That's because I'm not exactly sold on the wisdom of having only one month dedicated to our icons, as opposed to celebrating ALL of our historical figures throughout the year -- black, white, brown, red, yellow. *shrugs*...

1 hour ago
Well, I'm just as opposed to all this "political correctness" as the next person these days, but I think ethnic groups would be closer to the mark. Just terminology, though. Can't win for losing and we can't get out of the game, as the saying goes. Historical black figures do deserve their props but i do not believe that setting aside a set amount of time to honor them is productive to end racism. It only draws a distinction between whites, blacks, and any other group of people. Yeah, I can see your point there, and it's a valid one. I personally don't have an opinion about setting aside an entire month specifically for blacks. That's because I'm not exactly sold on the wisdom of having only one month dedicated to our icons, as opposed to celebrating ALL of our historical figures throughout the year -- black, white, brown, red, yellow. *shrugs*...
